casebody.data:
No. —, Original.

Ex parte: In the matter of William A. Higgins, et al., Petitioners. Submitted April 7, 1924. Decided April 14, 1924. Mr. Mark St ear-man and Mr. Emanuel J. Myers for petitioners. Mr. Wolcott H. Pitkin and Mr. Samuel J. Rosensohn for respondent.

Motion for leave to file petition for a writ of mandamus herein denied.
